subject: Football (College)
Rose Bowl (Football Game)
Beef
Diet and Nutrition
lead_paragraph: At the Beef Bowl, for decades a part of teams’ Rose Bowl itineraries, the players are as likely to count calories as the pounds of meat they can eat.
